label: cascading_failure_01_ep_016
content:
## 2024-01-30 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 140800 | p50: 155ms p95: 410ms p99: 780ms | err: 1.56% (2200 errors) | success: 98.44%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 140300 | p50: 105ms p95: 310ms p99: 520ms | err: 0.3% (420 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 137900 | p50: 190ms p95: 420ms p99: 600ms | err: 0.19% (260 errors) | success: 99.81%
- /auth: REQUESTS 183200 | p50: 36ms p95: 96ms p99: 165ms | err: 0.09% (160 errors) | success: 99.91%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 246300 | p50: 45ms p95: 130ms p99: 230ms | err: 0.09% (210 errors) | success: 99.91%
- /search: REQUESTS 213900 | p50: 66ms p95: 175ms p99: 300ms | err: 0.15% (320 errors) | success: 99.85%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 173500 | p50: 78ms p95: 220ms p99: 380ms | err: 0.18% (310 errors) | success: 99.82%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 62% | Mem 74% | Disk 62% | Conns: 3780 | Net: 590/705 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 59% | Mem 72% | Disk 61% | Conns: 3605 | Net: 570/685 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 58% | Mem 70% | Disk 59% | Conns: 2850 | Net: 430/510 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 36% | Mem 74% | Disk 84% | Conns: 310 | Net: 145/175 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 196 | idle 4 | waiting 85 | exhaustion: 7 | max: 200 | avg_wait: 85ms
- replica: active 92 | idle 8 | waiting 10 | exhaustion: 1 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 12ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 55 | exhaustion: 10 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 120ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92.8% | Bandwidth: 7.9 Gbps | Origin requests: 401200

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-01: pool=primary events=7 waiting=85
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-01: error_pct=1.56
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-02: geo_lookup_p99_ms=600

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments

### Events
- Scaled gateway autoscaling max from 6 to 8
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Increased connection pool max_size for third_party_geo from 60 to 60 (no change)
- Rotated service-B pods (rolling restart)

### On-Call
- Shift: E. Johnson. 7 pages (CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION, CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE). 3 tickets (POOL-552, CO-790, VEND-81). Status: Mitigating.
